name: NSDeleteRule
desc: Constants that determine what happens when you delete a relationshipâ€™s owning managed object.

items.name: case noActionDeleteRule
items.desc: A rule that prevents modification of the referenced managed objects.

items.name: case nullifyDeleteRule
items.desc: A rule that nullifies the inverse relationship of the referenced managed objects.

items.name: case cascadeDeleteRule
items.desc: A rule that deletes the referenced managed objects.

items.name: case denyDeleteRule
items.desc: A rule that prevents the deletion of the owning managed object if the relationship has references to other objects.
